column6: f.p.; Estd. from condy. study in $5 \times 10^{-4}$ mol L$^{-1}$ HNO$_3$; rel. to $k(\cdot OH + \cdot OH)$.
p.r.; Meas. buildup of abs. at 302 nm in NO$_3^-$ soln.; calcn. involves $k(\cdot OH + \cdot OH) = 0.6 \times 10^{10}$ and $k(\ce{NO_3^{2-} + H_2O -> NO_2 + 2 OH^-}) = 5.5 \times 10^4$ s$^{-1}$.
